snippet: Victor Sanchez pitched a no-hitter Wednesday night, allowing three base-runners in victory for the Iowa-based Clinton LumberKings over Michigan’s Class A Lansing Lugnuts.
lead_paragraph: Victor Sanchez pitched a no-hitter Wednesday night, allowing three base-runners in victory for the Iowa-based Clinton LumberKings over Michigan’s Class A Lansing Lugnuts.

headline.main: Class A Lansing Is No-Hit for a Third Time This Season
